document.full_text: a man who was apparently upset over a contentious divorce killed his ex wife, his ex-wife's lawyer and three others in the border city of yuma, before killing himself.
document.title: six dead in southern arizona shooting, including gunman's ex-wife and her lawyer
lines_and_colors: a man who was apparently upset over a contentious divorce killed his ex wife, his ex-wife's lawyer and three others in the border city of yuma, before killing himself.
